linkedIn_tip1: Step 1: Click the "Me" icon at the top of your LinkedIn home page.
linkedIn_tip3: Step 3: On your profile page, click Edit Public Profile & URL on the right rail.
linkedIn_tip4:
Step 4: In the Edit URL section in the right sidebar, find your public profile URL.
(It will be an address starting with www.linkedin.com/in)
linkedIn_tip5: Step 5: Copy and paste this link to share.
fb_tip1: Step 1: Go to Facebook, click on the profile you want to get the link.
fb_tip2: Step 2: On that profile page, click on the ellipsis icon.
fb_tip3: Step 3: In the section Link to your profile, select Copy link
